participant_1.background:
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
I enjoy trying to recreate my favorite dishes from my parent's home country.
I have fibromyalgia, so I need to stay warm this winter.
My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school.

participant_2.background:
I write poems about my life and my culture.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
i don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
i am a writer.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do in the winter?
I like to read and write poems about my life and my culture.
Oh that sounds interesting. What kind of culture is it?
It's a culture from a small island in the middle of the ocean.
Oh wow that sounds really cool. I've never been to an island before.
You should visit sometime! I'm sure you'd love it.
I'd like to but I don't think I'll be able to afford it anytime soon.
Well maybe you can come visit me when I get a job and have more money.
That would be great! I'd love to see your culture for myself.
Me too! We could go on hikes and swim in the ocean and explore the island.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm excited to see what it's like there.
